content: Filter VC 125/150 Gen 1 wet/dry ultra ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Accessories for dust and water management > Filters for vacuums and air cleaners- - - ### FEATURES:Features Vacuum cleaner filter with up to 3x filter lifetime Easier to clean due to extra-thick PTFE coating Filters that are suitable for wet applications are washable Applications High-performance vacuum cleaner filters, recommended for heavy-duty fine dust applications such as grinding, slitting, cutting etc. Maintenance tips: the filter is best cleaned using the vacuum cleaners internal filter cleaning mechanism (manual or automatic). Block the hose with your hand to increase the cleaning effect. Do not attempt to clean the filter by hitting it or using pressurized air. These actions may damage the filter. Avoid bending the filter. After washing and wet use let the filter dry out properly before using it in a dry application. We recommend a day of drying time. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Filters For use with: VC 125-6, VC 125-9, VC 150-10 G01, VC 150-6 G01 Filter material: Polyester+PTFE membrane Technical Data | Accessory type | Filters | For use with | VC 125-6, VC 125-9, VC 150-10 G01, VC 150-6 G01 | Filter material | Polyester+PTFE membrane | Filter type | Wet and Dry | Filter efficiency | 99.9% filter efficiency | Product information | For intensive dry & wet dust collection | Additional Accessory Information | For intensive dry & wet dust collection ### ITEMS- 436058 - Filter VC 125/150 Gen 1 wet/dry ultra - Package Size 1 pc
